TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl

summary.span: 表示資料繫結控制項的 SQL 資料庫。

span.span: Represents an SQL database to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [資料連接Data Connections](#data_connections) - [執行資料作業Performing Data Operations](#performing_data_operations) - [資料提供者Data Provider](#data_provider) - [快取Caching](#caching) - [其他功能Additional Features](#additional_features) - [資料來源檢視Data Source View](#data_source_view) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 資料來源控制項表示資料繫結控制項 SQL 關聯式資料庫中的資料。The data source control represents data in an SQL relational database to data-bound controls. 您可以使用一起與資料繫結控制項，從關聯式資料庫擷取資料，來顯示、 編輯和排序資料，使用幾乎任何程式碼的網頁上的控制項。You can use the control in conjunction with a data-bound control to retrieve data from a relational database and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page with little or no code. ## 資料連接Data Connections 若要連接到資料庫，您必須設定屬性設為有效的連接字串。To connect to a database, you must set the property to a valid connection string. 可支援可連接到使用 ADO.NET 提供者，例如任何 SQL 關聯式資料庫`SqlClient`， `OleDb`， `Odbc`，或`OracleClient`提供者。The can support any SQL relational database that can be connected to using an ADO.NET provider, such as the `SqlClient`, `OleDb`, `Odbc`, or `OracleClient` provider. 如需如何保護連接字串資訊，請參閱[How To:使用資料來源控制項時，使用安全連接字串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。For information about how to secure connection strings, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62). 若要從基礎資料庫擷取資料，請設定使用 SQL 查詢的屬性。To retrieve data from an underlying database, set the property with an SQL query. 如果資料庫的相關聯的支援預存程序，您可以設定預存程序名稱的屬性。If the database that the is associated with supports stored procedures, you can set the property to the name of a stored procedure. 您指定的 SQL 查詢也可以是參數化的查詢。The SQL query that you specify can also be a parameterized query. 您可以加入參數化查詢相關聯的物件集合。You can add objects that are associated with a parameterized query to the collection. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和其語法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，以篩選的資料來源控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and their syntax, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f(v=vs.100)). 控制項擷取資料時呼叫方法。The control retrieves data whenever the method is called. 這個方法會提供以程式設計方式存取所指定的方法屬性。This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by property. 方法會自動呼叫繫結至控制項當他們呼叫方法。The method is automatically called by controls that are bound to the when their method is called. 如果您將設定資料繫結控制項的屬性，控制自動繫結至資料來源的資料，視需要。If you set the property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as required. 設定`DataSourceID`屬性是繫結的建議的方法資料繫結控制項的控制項。Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an control to a data-bound control. 或者，您可以使用`DataSource`屬性，但接著您必須明確地呼叫資料繫結控制項的方法。Alternatively, you can use the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the method of the data-bound control. 可以使用的資料繫結控制項的一些範例都， ， ，和。Some examples of data-bound controls that can use are , , , and . 您可以呼叫方法以程式設計方式在任何時間，來擷取基礎資料庫中的資料。You can call the method programmatically at any time to retrieve data from the underlying database. 在宣告式和程式設計 ASP.NET 案例中，您可以設定資料繫結控制項的 id 屬性控制項。In declarative and programmatic ASP.NET scenarios, you can set the property of the data-bound control to the ID of the control. 您也可以指派的執行個體類別來資料繫結控制項的屬性。You can also assign an instance of the class to the property of the data-bound control. 如需有關將資料繫結控制項繫結至資料來源控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取選項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d)。For more information about binding data-bound control to data source controls, see [ASP.NET Data Access Options](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d). ## 執行資料作業Performing Data Operations 根據基礎資料庫產品的執行個體組態的功能類別，您可以執行資料作業，例如插入、 更新和刪除。Depending on the capabilities of the underlying database product and the configuration of the instance of the class, you can perform data operations, such as updates, inserts, and deletes. 若要執行這些資料作業，設定適當的命令文字和任何相關聯的參數，您想要執行的作業。To perform these data operations, set the appropriate command text and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform. 例如，更新作業，設定屬性設為 SQL 字串或預存程序的名稱並加入任何必要的參數，以集合。For example, for an update operation, set the property to an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure and add any required parameters to the collection. 在執行更新時呼叫方法時，可以明確地您的程式碼也會自動由資料繫結控制項。The update is performed when the method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control. 遵循相同的一般模式和作業。The same general pattern is followed for and operations. SQL 查詢和使用中的命令， ， ，和可以參數化屬性。The SQL queries and commands that you use in the , , , and properties can be parameterized. 這表示，查詢或命令可以使用預留位置，而不是常值的值並將預留位置繫結至應用程式或使用者定義的變數。This means that the query or command can use placeholders instead of literal values and bind the placeholders to application or user-defined variables. 您可以結合 SQL 查詢中的參數，工作階段變數時，會在 Web Form 網頁的查詢字串傳遞的值，其他伺服器控制項，以及其他的屬性值。You can bind parameters in SQL queries to Session variables, values that are passed on the query string for a Web Forms page, the property values of other server controls, and more. 如需有關如何使用 SQL 查詢中使用參數，請參閱 < [ 與篩選的資料來源控制項使用的參數](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f(v=vs.100))和[使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).For more information about how to use parameters in SQL queries with the , see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f(v=vs.100)) and [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，如果其中一個參數是`null`當您執行`Select`命令中，將會傳回任何資料，並將擲回任何例外狀況。By default, if one of the parameters is `null` when you execute a `Select` command, no data will be returned and no exception will be thrown. 您可以設定來變更此行為屬性設`false`。You can change this behavior by setting the property to `false`. ## 資料提供者Data Provider 根據預設，控制的運作與.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server，但不是 Microsoft SQL Server 專屬。By default, the control works with the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, but is not Microsoft SQL Server-specific. 您可以連接受管理的 ADO.NET 提供者是任何資料庫產品的控制項。You can connect the control with any database product for which there is a managed ADO.NET provider. 當搭配提供者，可以使用任何 OLE DB 相容的資料庫。When used with the provider, the can work with any OLE DB-compliant database. 當搭配提供者，可以搭配任何 ODBC 驅動程式和資料庫，包括 IBM DB2、 MySQL 和 PostgreSQL。When used with the provider, the can be used with any ODBC driver and database, including IBM DB2, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. 當搭配提供者，能與 Oracle 8.1.7 資料庫及更新版本。When used with the provider, the can work with Oracle 8.1.7 databases and later. 允許的提供者清單中註冊`DbProviderFactories`組態檔，在 Machine.config 或 Web.config 檔案區段。The list of allowable providers is registered in the `DbProviderFactories` section of the configuration file, either in the Machine.config or Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 SqlDataSource 控制項的選取資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb). ## 快取Caching 如果您顯示資料在頁面使用控制項，您可以使用快取的資料來源控制項功能的資料增加網頁的效能。If you display data on your page using a control, you can increase the performance of the page by using the data caching capabilities of the data source control. 快取可減少資料庫伺服器，但代價是 Web 伺服器上的記憶體的處理負載在大部分情況下，這會是理想的取捨。Caching reduces the processing load on the database servers at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases, this is a good trade-off. 自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`而屬性設定為快取會將資料儲存在捨棄快取項目之前的秒數。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 您也可以指定和選擇性值。You can also specify a and an optional value. ## 其他功能Additional Features 提供額外的功能，如下表所示。The provides additional capabilities, as listed in the following table. |功能Capability|需求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |快取Caching|設定屬性，以的值，屬性設`true`，而和根據您想要針對您快取資料的快取行為的屬性。Set the property to the value, the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| |DeletingDeleting|設定用來刪除資料的 SQL 陳述式的屬性。Set the property to an SQL statement used to delete data. 此陳述式通常已參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |篩選Filtering|設定屬性設值。Set the property to the value. 設定屬性，以用來篩選資料的篩選運算式時呼叫方法。Set the property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the method is called.| |插入Inserting|設定用來插入資料的 SQL 陳述式的屬性。Set the property to an SQL statement used to insert data. 此陳述式通常已參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |分頁Paging|不支援目前，不過有些資料繫結控制項，例如，支援分頁，當您設定屬性設值。Not currently supported by the , however some data-bound controls, such as , support paging when you set the property to the value.| |選取Selecting|設定用來擷取資料的 SQL 陳述式的屬性。Set the property to an SQL statement used to retrieve data.| |排序Sorting|將 屬性設定為 。Set the property to .| |UpdatingUpdating|設定用來更新資料的 SQL 陳述式的屬性。Set the property to an SQL statement used to update data. 此陳述式通常已參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| ## 資料來源檢視Data Source View 如同所有的資料來源控制項，控制項是在資料來源檢視類別與相關聯。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a data source view class. 控制項，則只有一個相關聯，且一律命名為`Table`。The control has only one associated , and it is always named `Table`. 沒有任何視覺化的呈現的控制項，好讓您可以建立其以宣告方式，並選擇性地允許它參與的狀態管理，它會實作為一個控制項。There is no visual rendering of the control; it is implemented as a control so that you can create it declaratively and, optionally, to allow it to participate in state management. 如此一來，不支援視覺化功能，例如所提供的項目或屬性。As a result, the does not support visual features, such as the ones that are provided by the or property. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 本節包含四個程式碼範例：This section contains four code examples: - 第一個程式碼範例示範如何顯示資料從 SQL Server 中控制使用宣告式語法。The first code example demonstrates how to display data from SQL Server in a control using declarative syntax. - 第二個程式碼範例示範如何從 ODBC 相容資料庫中的資料顯示控制使用宣告式語法。The second code example demonstrates how to display data from an ODBC-compliant database in a control using declarative syntax. - 第三個程式碼範例示範如何顯示及更新中的資料控制項。The third code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. - 第四個程式碼範例示範如何顯示及更新中的資料控制項。The fourth code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. > [!NOTE] > 這些範例示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何使用程式碼，而非標記來存取資料的資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項以宣告方式來擷取 SQL Server 中的資料，並顯示在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項以宣告方式來從符合 ODBC 規範的資料庫擷取資料，並顯示在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 屬性是名稱的.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC，後者是。The property is the name of the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, which is . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/CS/odbc3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/VB/odbc3vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範常見的顯示和更新的情況中使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the control. 如先前範例中，從 Northwind 資料庫的資料會顯示在控制項。As with the previous examples, data from the Northwind database is displayed in the control. 此外，因為指定屬性和屬性設定為`true`，您可以編輯和更新的記錄沒有額外的程式碼。Additionally, because an property is specified and the property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code. 控制項，會自動處理加入參數以集合並呼叫方法時**更新**按鈕按一下控制項時。The control automatically handles adding parameters to the collection and calls the method when the **Update** button in the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/CS/sql5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/VB/sql5vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範常見的顯示和更新的情況中使用和控制項。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the and controls. 控制項不會自動新增至更新參數集合，也不呼叫方法，所以您必須這樣做。The control does not automatically add update parameters to the collection nor call the method, so you must do so. 更新參數以宣告方式指定，而且您可以新增事件處理常式執行時就會引發事件的作業。The update parameters are specified declaratively and you can add an event handler to perform the operation when an event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含文字方塊中，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL 語法`selectCommand`取決於目前 ADO.NET 提供者正在使用中，以識別屬性。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax for `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，該參數的替代符號是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 值可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The value can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control using the constructor. 此範例是不尋常的控制項用不在 Web Form 頁面上，但在中介層物件的實作中做簡單的方式，為商務物件，與資料庫互動。The example is unusual in that the control is being used not on a Web Forms page, but in the implementation of a middle-tier object as a simple way for a business object to interact with a database. 此範例會使用連接字串儲存在 Web.config 檔案中。The example uses a connection string that is stored in the Web.config file. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源控制項快取 方法所擷取之資料的時間長度 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data that is retrieved by the method.

value.span: 快取 作業結果的秒數。

span.span: The number of seconds that the caches the results of a operation.

value.span: 預設值為 0。
值不能為負。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 快取資料，雖然方法會從快取，而不是從基礎資料庫擷取資料。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 當快取過期時，方法會從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 控制項自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`而屬性設為大於 0，表示快取會儲存資料的快取項目之前的秒數會被捨棄。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值為 0 表示無限長的快取。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 快取的行為取決於持續時間的組合和屬性。The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the duration and the property. 如果屬性設定為的值，快取資料的第一個資料擷取作業、 保留它在記憶體中，最多的時間所指定的量屬性。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by property. 需要記憶體時，就可能持續時間的時間之前, 釋放資料。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is required. 下次執行作業，然後會重新整理快取。The cache is then refreshed during the next operation. 如果屬性設定為值，資料來源控制項快取上第一次的資料擷取作業的資料，但重設它所保留的快取中的每個後續作業的時間範圍。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation. 快取到期時間，等於沒有活動是否值自上次作業。The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the value since the last operation. 控制項可以快取資料，只有當它在時模式。The control can cache data only when it is in mode. A所擲回例外狀況方法，如果控制設為 值和快取也會啟用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用在 Microsoft Windows 驗證的用戶端模擬時，第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一位使用者要求相同的資料，就會從快取擷取資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料，不會擷取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上的使用者存取資料，而且您想要每個擷取資料的安全性組態資料庫所要驗證，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並顯示在控制項，以啟用快取的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 設定為 20 秒，因為屬性設定為值，根據預設，此頁面的使用者會看到新的資料每隔 20 秒。The is set to 20 seconds and, because the property is set to the value by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 其中一個 值。
預設值為 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 快取資料，雖然方法會從快取，而不是從基礎資料庫擷取資料。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 當快取過期時，方法會從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 快取的行為取決於多種和設定。The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the and settings. 如果屬性設定為的值，快取資料的第一個資料擷取作業、 保留在記憶體中所指定的時間長度屬性，然後再捨棄它之後的時間失效。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for the amount of time that is specified by the property, and then discards it after the time has lapsed. 下次執行作業，然後會重新整理快取。The cache is then refreshed during the next operation. 如果屬性設定為值，資料來源控制項快取上第一次的資料擷取作業的資料，但重設它所保留的快取中的每個後續作業的時間範圍。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation. 快取到期時間，等於沒有活動是否值自上次作業。The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the value since the last operation. 控制項可以快取資料中的時，才模式。The control can cache data only when in the mode. A所擲回例外狀況方法，如果控制設為 值和快取也會啟用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用在 Microsoft Windows 驗證的用戶端模擬時，第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一位使用者要求相同的資料，就會從快取擷取資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料，不會擷取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上的使用者存取資料，而且您想要每個擷取資料的安全性組態資料庫所要驗證，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並顯示在控制項，以啟用快取的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 因為屬性設定為的值，使用者不會看到新的資料即使值是 20 秒。Because the property is set to the value, users will not see fresh data even though the value is 20 seconds. 只有當沒有任何活動上超過 20 秒自最後一個頁面載入時，會重新整理快取的資料。The cached data is refreshed only if there is no activity on the page for more than 20 seconds since the last page load. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/CS/sql19cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/VB/sql19vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 快取資料，雖然方法會從快取，而不是從基礎資料庫擷取資料。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 當快取過期時，方法會從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 您可以設定屬性，以建立所建立的所有快取項目之間的相依性控制項和索引鍵。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the control and the key. 您以程式設計方式可以在任何時間過期所有快取項目，藉由索引鍵過期。You can programmatically expire all the cache entries at any time by expiring the key. 控制項可以快取資料中的時，才模式。The control can cache data only when in the mode. A所擲回例外狀況方法，如果控制設為 值和快取也會啟用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. 唯一快取項目建立的每個組合， ，和屬性。A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the , , and properties. 多個控制項可以使用相同的快取項目在案例中的控制項位置載入相同的資料來自相同的基礎資料庫。Multiple controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where the controls load the same data from the same underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用在 Microsoft Windows 驗證的用戶端模擬時，第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一位使用者要求相同的資料，就會從快取擷取資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料，不會擷取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上的使用者存取資料，而且您想要每個擷取資料的安全性組態資料庫所要驗證，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在作業期間，當基礎資料庫的資料列資料發生變更時， 控制項如何執行更新和刪除作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the value indicating how the control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying database changes during the time of the operation.

value.span: 其中一個 值。
預設值為 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否要將舊的和新值的參數套用至`Update`方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 比方說，如果命令是所指定屬性會傳回物件的資料行`Name`並`Number`和屬性設定為值，參數會針對`Name`並`Number`如`Update`方法。For example, if the command that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number` and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果屬性設定為的值，參數會針對`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Number`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (原始值的確切名稱的參數取決於屬性。)控制項接著會判斷如果`Update`方法中指定屬性具有相符的參數。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the property.) The control then determines if the `Update` method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 並行存取控制是一種技術，來控制如何讀取及多個用戶端存取和管理相同的資料時，存放區中變更資料的資料存放區使用。Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一個用戶端讀取資料，並提供給使用者，而另一個用戶端讀取相同的資料，並提供給不同的使用者。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果兩個使用者更新的資料，並將它提交至資料存放區，可能會發生一些未預期的結果，因為兩個用戶端可能會更新為相同的資料不同的值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 這會視為衝突。This is considered a conflict. 藉由設定屬性，以的值，您`Update`方法可以再比較新舊值來偵測衝突，並處理它們，視原始資料來源。By setting the property to the value, your `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

summary.span: 取得和設定 ADO.NET 提供者特定的連接字串， 控制項會用來連接至基礎資料庫。

span.span: Gets or sets the ADO.NET provider-specific connection string that the control uses to connect to an underlying database.

value.span: .NET Framework 資料提供者特定字串用來連接到它所代表的 SQL 資料庫。

span.span: A .NET Framework data provider-specific string that the uses to connect to the SQL database that it represents.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以搭配各種不同的 ADO.NET 提供者和用來連接到基礎資料來源的連接字串語法是特定提供者。The control can be used with a variety of ADO.NET providers and the syntax of the connection string that is used to connect to an underlying data source is specific to the provider. 當您設定控制項，您設定的資料庫類型的屬性 (預設值是)，而且您將屬性設為連接字串，其中包含連接所需的資訊保存到資料庫。When you configure a control, you set the property to the type of database (the default is ), and you set the property to a connection string that includes information that is required in order to connect to the database. 連接字串的內容是根據資料庫存取資料來源控制項的類型而有所不同。The contents of a connection string differ depending on what type of database the data source control is accessing. 比方說，控制項需要伺服器名稱、 資料庫 (catalog) 名稱及如何驗證使用者，當連接到 SQL Server 的相關資訊。For example, the control requires a server name, database (catalog) name, and information about how to authenticate the user when connecting to a SQL Server. 連接字串的內容的相關資訊，請參閱屬性類別屬性類別屬性類別，或屬性類別。For information about the contents of connection strings, see the property for the class, property for the class, property for the class, or the property for the class. 如果您變更屬性，引發事件時，造成任何繫結至的控制項重新繫結的控制項。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the control to rebind. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如需儲存連接字串資訊，請參閱[How To:使用資料來源控制項時，使用安全連接字串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。For information about storing a connection string, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性設為連接到 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫，並顯示的結果屬性中的控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. 第二個程式碼範例示範更複雜的案例中，其中控制項用來顯示及更新在受密碼保護的 Microsoft Access 資料庫中的資料。The second code example demonstrates a more complex scenario, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Microsoft Access database. 在每個案例中， `connectionStrings` Web.config 檔案的項目會顯示第一個，後面接著包含 ASP.NET 網頁控制項。In each case, the `connectionStrings` element of the Web.config file is shown first, followed by the ASP.NET page that contains the control. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性設為連接到 SQL Server 資料庫，並顯示的結果屬性中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範更複雜的案例比先前的程式碼範例，其中控制項用來顯示及更新受密碼保護 Access 資料庫中的資料。The following code example demonstrates a more complex scenario than the preceding code example, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Access database. 因為存取權，可搭配屬性設定為提供者，而屬性設定為 UNC 共用存取資料庫的適當連接字串。Because the is used with Access, the property is set to the provider, and the property is set to an appropriate connection string for a UNC-shared Access database. A控制項會顯示訂單的出貨日期。A control displays orders with shipment dates. 您可以更新訂單，以選取適當的核取方塊，然後按一下**更新** 按鈕。You can update an order by checking the appropriate check box, and then clicking the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含僅供說明用途的純文字密碼。This example includes a password in plain text only for illustration purposes. 在生產環境應用程式，應該加密連接字串，包含密碼。In a production application, connection strings that include passwords should be encrypted. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護連線資訊](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md)。For more information, see [Protecting Connection Information](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料擷取模式識別如何控制項會從基礎資料庫中擷取資料。The data retrieval mode identifies how a control retrieves data from the underlying database. 當屬性設定為的值，將資料載入至物件和儲存在伺服器上的記憶體。When the property is set to the value, data is loaded into a object and stored in memory on the server. 這項功能，使用者介面控制項，這類情況，提供排序、 篩選和分頁功能。This enables scenarios where user interface controls, such as , offer sorting, filtering, and paging capabilities. 當屬性設定為的值，以擷取資料物件，這是順向、 唯讀資料指標。When the property is set to the value, data is retrieved by a object, which is a forward-only, read-only cursor. 特定型別的物件相依於最終資料提供者所使用，以識別屬性。The specific type of the object depends on the NET data provider that the uses, which is identified by the property. 根據預設，控制項所使用的提供者的 Microsoft SQL Server ，以及資料讀取器物件。By default, the control uses the provider for Microsoft SQL Server, the , and the data reader is a object. 如果您變更屬性，引發事件時，造成任何繫結至的控制項重新繫結。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性若要控制值的案例需要未排序的控制項、 分頁或篩選。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control to the value for a scenario with a control that requires no sorting, paging, nor filtering. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用 SQL 字串和 集合中的任何參數，執行刪除作業。

span.span: Performs a delete operation using the SQL string and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 表示從基礎資料庫刪除之資料列數的值。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行刪除作業之前，請會呼叫方法以引發事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行刪除作業之前任何前置處理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete operation. 在作業完成之後，會呼叫方法以引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法提供以程式設計方式存取`Delete`方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Delete` method. 如果控制項相關聯的資料繫結控制項，會自動呼叫的資料繫結控制項**刪除**方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the **Delete** method. 方法會委派給方法相關聯的物件控制項。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要執行的作業，組建物件使用文字以及任何相關聯值，然後再執行對基礎資料庫。To perform the operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定文字從 Northwind 資料庫中刪除訂單。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 一開始，資料會從 Orders 資料表中擷取並顯示在控制項。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 您必須明確宣告屬性並呼叫方法時使用資料繫結控制項，例如(不像其他控制項，例如和，這會自動填入參數和呼叫上資料來源控制項的方法)。You must explicitly declare the property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as the (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call the method on a data source control). 在此範例中，事件會委派給私用`OnDelete`事件處理常式，它會明確呼叫方法控制項。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

member this.DeleteCommand : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 字串， 控制項會用來刪除基礎資料庫的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to delete data from the underlying database.

value.span: SQL 字串， 會用來刪除資料。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to delete data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 SQL 查詢或預存程序中，名稱，並由方法。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型的查詢或命令，參數的語法也會取決於所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者中。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the syntax of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，參數的語法是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the syntax of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或是，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料庫支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the database supports stored procedures. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 基於安全考量，屬性不會儲存在檢視狀態。For security purposes, the property is not stored in view state. 因為它可能會有要解碼的用戶端上的檢視狀態內容，在檢視中儲存機密資訊的資料庫結構狀態可能會導致資訊洩漏弱點。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定文字從 Northwind 資料庫的 Orders 資料表中刪除訂單。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table. 資料會從 Orders 資料表中擷取並顯示在控制項。Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 呈現**刪除**自動按鈕時屬性設定為`true`。The renders a **Delete** button automatically when the property is set to `true`. 此外，當**刪除**按一下按鈕時，控制會自動填入集合並呼叫方法。Additionally, when the **Delete** button is clicked, the control automatically populates the collection and calls the method. 最後，因為此程式碼範例會刪除資料，則事件處理常式嘗試將資料庫備份至磁碟之前新增作業。Finally, because this code example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理刪除作業完成後，事件，以檢查的值輸出參數。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after a delete operation has completed. 輸出參數都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 取得參數集合，包含與 控制項相關聯之 物件 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，包含 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢集合包含任何對應至 SQL 字串中參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. > [!NOTE] > 請確定沒有繫結至資料繫結控制項中的控制項控制項具有符合中的任何參數名稱集合。Make sure that no controls in the data-bound control that you bind to the control have names that match any parameter names in the collection. 可能有相同的名稱，因為繫結的欄位會排除 SQL 命令和 「 未提供參數 」 錯誤的參數。Parameters that have the same name as bound fields are excluded from the SQL command, and a "parameter was not supplied" error might result. 如果屬性設定為值，參數會針對資料的舊和新值。If the property is set to the value, the parameters are created for both the old and new values of the data. 舊值的參數會根據名為屬性。The parameters for the old values are named according to the property. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者，這是參數的順序集合可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者建立關聯的集合，根據參數在參數化 SQL 查詢中的出現的順序中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，也就是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，使集合中的參數符合 SQL 查詢中預留位置的參數名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性會擷取屬性所含相關聯的物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定文字從 Northwind 資料庫中刪除訂單。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 一開始，資料會從 Orders 資料表中擷取並顯示在控制項。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 您必須明確宣告屬性並呼叫方法時使用資料繫結控制項，例如(不像其他控制項，例如和，這會自動填入的參數和呼叫上資料來源控制項)。You must explicitly declare property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call on a data source control). 在此範例中，事件會委派給私用`OnDelete`事件處理常式，它會明確呼叫方法控制項。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleting As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 在刪除作業之前發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前的額外的初始化作業控制項執行刪除作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時不會呼叫事件處理常式委派。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您無法取消此作業，直接藉由呼叫方法物件所公開物件。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 您可以不過，將在資料庫作業取消藉由設定的屬性物件到`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理之前，會引發的事件作業就會發生。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event that is raised before a operation occurs. 因為此範例會從 Northwind 資料庫中，刪除資料，所以處理常式會嘗試將資料庫備份至磁碟之前加入執行作業。Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否啟用了資料快取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has data caching enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用了資料來源控制項的資料快取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 快取資料，雖然方法會從快取，而不是從基礎資料庫擷取資料。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 當快取過期時，方法會從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 控制項自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`而屬性設為大於 0，表示快取會儲存資料，然後再擷取秒數全新的設定。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before retrieving a fresh set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用在 Microsoft Windows 驗證的用戶端模擬時，第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一位使用者要求相同的資料，就會從快取擷取資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料，不會擷取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上的使用者存取資料，而且您想要每個擷取資料的安全性組態資料庫所要驗證，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並顯示在控制項，以啟用快取的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 屬性設定為`true`而設為 20 秒。The property is set to `true` and the is set to 20 seconds. 因為屬性設定為欄位，根據預設，此頁面的使用者會看到新的資料每隔 20 秒。Because the property is set to the field by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

member this.FilterExpression : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定當呼叫 時會套用的篩選運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method is called.

value.span: 字串，代表當使用 方法抓取資料時套用的篩選運算式。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值是格式字串運算式 (字串，由處理方法) 使用中的值包含在字串中任何替代參數的集合。The property value is a format string expression (a string that is processed by the method) that uses the values in the collection for any substitution parameters included in the string. 篩選條件運算式語法是可接受的相同語法屬性，因為篩選運算式套用至屬性物件時所傳回的執行方法。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property, because the filter expression is applied to the property of the object that is returned from executing the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如果您加入的參數集合，您也可以包含格式字串的預留位置 (例如`"{0}")`中要取代的參數值的運算式。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders (for example, `"{0}")` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 依照中的參數索引來取代預留位置集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 如果中的物件集合是`null`，該物件會取代為空字串。If an object in the collection is `null`, the object will be replaced by an empty string. 您可以包含在參數屬性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果參數是字串或字元類型，請使用單引號括住的參數。If the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果參數是數值類型，就不需要引號。Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含的參數預留位置中找到的評估屬性。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 控制項支援篩選的資料中的時，才模式。The control supports filtering data only when in the mode. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並使用篩選字串和集合。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using a string and the collection. 屬性會套用任何時間方法會執行，以擷取資料。The property is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此範例中，包含篩選參數，包含此功能的預留位置集合。In this example, the contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，filter 參數是繫結至物件屬性控制項。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因為控制項具有其屬性設定為`true`，選取範圍中的任何變更控制項會在頁面回傳至伺服器的資訊和控制項重新繫結至資料來源使用新的篩選器來控制。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection for the control causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的參數集合相關聯的任何參數，指定在屬性。The parameters in the collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the property. 中指定的參數預留位置屬性會比對中的參數物件的順序集合時呼叫方法。The parameter placeholders that are specified in the property are matched by order to parameter objects in the collection when the method is called. 屬性會擷取屬性所含相關聯的物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並使用篩選和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 的屬性隨時套用控制方法會執行，以擷取資料。The property of the control is applied anytime the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此範例中，屬性包含篩選參數，包含此功能的預留位置集合。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，filter 參數是繫結至物件屬性控制項。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因為控制項都有其屬性設定為`true`中的任何變更選取項目會導致頁面回傳至伺服器的資訊和重新繫結至資料來源控制項使用的控制項新的篩選器。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows inserted into the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行插入作業之前，請會呼叫方法以引發事件。Before the insert operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理之前作業。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before the operation. 若要執行插入作業，物件的組建物件使用文字以及任何相關聯屬性，然後執行對基礎資料庫的物件。To perform an insert operation, the object builds an object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 在作業完成之後，會呼叫方法以引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法提供以程式設計方式存取`Insert`方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Insert` method. 如果控制項相關聯的資料繫結控制項，會自動呼叫的資料繫結控制項`Insert`方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the `Insert` method. 方法會委派給方法相關聯的物件控制項。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單的 Web Form 網頁。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 目前的資料，資料表中的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以藉由輸入值中的新增記錄控制項，然後按一下**插入** 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 當**插入**按一下按鈕時，為指定的值會插入至資料庫，然後會重新整理。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and then the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅的文字方塊中，值插入參數，而不需驗證，這也是潛在的安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). > [!NOTE] > 此範例示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何使用程式碼，而非標記來存取資料的資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 SQL 查詢或預存程序中，名稱，並由方法。The represents either an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，該參數的替代符號是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或是，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 可以是 SQL 字串或名稱的預存程序中，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 這個屬性會將委派給的屬性相關聯控制項。This property delegates to the property of the that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 基於安全考量，屬性不會儲存檢視狀態。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因為它可能會有要解碼的用戶端上的檢視狀態內容，在檢視中儲存機密資訊的資料庫結構狀態可能會導致資訊洩漏弱點。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單的 Web Form 網頁。The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 擷取資料並顯示在控制項，以及如何使用控制項，以查看所選資料列的詳細資料控制項和表單，以插入新的記錄。The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row into the control and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 這些範例示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何使用程式碼，而非標記來存取資料的資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單的 Web Form 網頁。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 目前的資料，資料表中的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以藉由輸入值來新增記錄控制項，然後按一下**插入** 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values into the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 當**插入**按一下按鈕時，為指定的值會插入至資料庫，而控制重新整理。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含可接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅，文字方塊中，值插入參數，而不需驗證，這也是潛在的安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 SQL Server 擷取資料，並顯示在控制項，以及如何使用以查看所選的資料列中的詳細資料的控制項控制項和表單，以插入新的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the control and as a form to insert new records. 一開始，資料會顯示在控制項，以及選取的資料列的也會顯示在控制項。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控制項使用不同的資料來源控制項; 相關聯的一個具有並屬性，可確保所選的資料列的是顯示此項目。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面，可用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 範例會使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入一筆記錄，會自動填入的呼叫與繫結資料行值的集合方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數物件時使用 ASP.NET 的雙向資料繫結語法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數在事件處理常式來處理預存程序所傳回的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，資料會插入資料庫之後控制項中，事件處理常式會呼叫來處理事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值會顯示和方法控制項明確地呼叫，以重新整理資料。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在插入作業之前發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前的額外的初始化作業控制項執行插入作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時不會呼叫事件處理常式委派。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您無法取消此作業，直接藉由呼叫方法物件，由屬性。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the property. 您可以不過，將在資料庫作業取消藉由設定的屬性物件到`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 擷取資料並顯示在控制項，以及如何使用以查看所選的資料列中的詳細資料的控制項和表單，以插入新的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 此範例示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何使用程式碼，而非標記來存取資料的資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 一開始，資料會顯示在控制項，以及選取的資料列的也會顯示在控制項。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控制項使用不同的資料來源控制項; 相關聯的一個具有並屬性，可確保所選的資料列的是顯示此項目。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面，可用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 範例會使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入一筆記錄，會自動填入的呼叫與繫結資料行值的集合方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數使用 ASP.NET 的雙向資料繫結語法時。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數在事件處理常式來處理預存程序所傳回的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，資料會插入資料庫之後控制項，事件處理常式會呼叫來處理會顯示事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值，而`DataBind`方法控制項明確地呼叫，以重新整理資料。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the `DataBind` method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得參數集合，包含與 控制項相關聯之 物件 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，包含 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會擷取屬性所含相關聯的物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢集合包含任何對應至 SQL 字串中參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者，這是參數的順序集合可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者建立關聯的參數出現在參數化 SQL 查詢的順序根據集合中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，也就是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，將集合中的參數，藉由比對的 SQL 查詢中的預留位置別名的參數名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單的 Web Form 網頁。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 目前的資料，資料表中的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以藉由輸入值中的新增記錄控制項，然後按一下**插入** 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 當**插入**按一下按鈕時，為指定的值會插入至資料庫，而控制重新整理。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含可接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅，文字方塊中，值插入參數，而不需驗證，這也是潛在的安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). > [!NOTE] > 此範例示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何使用程式碼，而非標記來存取資料的資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定格式字串，套用至傳遞給 或 方法之任何參數的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of any parameters that are passed to the or method.

value.span: 字串，表示套用至傳遞給 或 方法之任何 參數名稱的格式字串。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any parameters passed to the or methods.

value.span: 預設值為「{0}」。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字串只會套用到主索引鍵，例如那些由識別`DataKeyNames`屬性的相關聯的資料繫結控制項，或刪除和更新案例其中屬性設定為值和一組`oldValues`會傳遞至對應的資料方法。The format string is applied only to primary keys, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the associated data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在此情況下，格式字串套用至每個參數名稱，在`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 兩種常見的案例，您可能會在其中變更屬性如下所示：Two common scenarios where you might change the property are as follows: - 若要區分在更新中的舊和新值。To differentiate between old and new values in updates. 當屬性設定為值，參數的原始和新的值都會加入集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 沒有格式化的字串，具有相同名稱的兩個參數就會建立每個資料欄位。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 藉由變更原始值參數的名稱，您可以比較資料與原始的資料來源，以便偵測衝突，並比較索引鍵的值。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 有些視覺化設計工具會實作特定的命名配置，針對原始值和索引鍵。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys.

summary.span: 取得或設定 .NET Framework 資料提供者的名稱， 控制項會用來連接至基礎資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .NET Framework data provider that the control uses to connect to an underlying data source.

value.span: 使用的資料提供者名稱，如果未設定提供者，則為 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET。

span.span: The name of the data provider that the uses; otherwise, the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server, if no provider is set.

value.span: 預設值為 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET。

span.span: The default is the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 包含下列資料提供者：The .NET Framework includes the following data providers: - 提供者是.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的預設值。The provider is the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. - 提供者是.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB. - 提供者是.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC. - 提供者是.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle. 永遠不會設定為未受管理的 ADO.NET 提供者的名稱這類`MSDAORA`。The property is never set to the name of an unmanaged ADO.NET provider, such as `MSDAORA`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 SqlDataSource 控制項的選取資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb). 如果您變更屬性，引發事件時，造成任何繫結至的控制項重新繫結。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 可用的提供者清單中指定`DbProviderFactories`子區段`system.data`Machine.config 檔的區段。A list of available providers is specified in the `DbProviderFactories` subsection of the `system.data` section of the Machine.config file. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼示範如何連線到 SQL Server 資料庫，使用預設.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server控制項， 。The first code demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server for the control, the . 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC，ODBC 資料庫連接。The second code example demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 下列程式碼範例示範如何連接到 SQL Server 資料庫使用的預設資料提供者控制項， 。The following code example demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default data provider for the control, the . 每當未明確設定屬性，會使用預設提供者。Whenever the property is not explicitly set, the default provider is used. 屬性是特定提供者。The property is provider-specific. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例中，也就是在功能上與先前的程式碼範例相同，示範如何使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC，ODBC 資料庫連接。The following code example, which is functionally the same as the preceding code example, demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 屬性設定為 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN) 是用來連接至 ODBC 資料庫的名稱。The property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN) that is used to connect to the ODBC database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/CS/odbc1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/VB/odbc1vb.aspx#1)]
