summary.span: 使用 SQL 字串和 集合中的任何參數，從基礎資料庫擷取資料。

span.span: Retrieves data from the underlying database by using the SQL string and any parameters that are in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間，會自動呼叫方法頁面生命週期的階段。The method is automatically called during the phase of the page life cycle. 它會呼叫已附加至的資料繫結控制項控制項透過其屬性。It is called by data-bound controls that have been attached to a control through their property. 方法會傳回物件，如果屬性設定為值。The method returns a object if the property is set to the value. 方法會傳回物件，如果屬性設定為值。The method returns a object if the property is set to the value. 關閉物件，當您完成讀取資料。Close the object when you have finished reading the data. 再執行作業時，方法呼叫來引發事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行任何處理之前作業。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any processing before the operation. 在後作業完成時，方法呼叫來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 如果屬性設定為並已啟用快取，則物件擷取資料，並將資料儲存至快取期間作業。If the property is set to and caching is enabled, the object retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 快取建立時，已捨棄，或重新整理基礎的組合所指定的快取行為和屬性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用在 Microsoft Windows 驗證的用戶端模擬時，第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一位使用者要求相同的資料，就會從快取擷取資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料，不會擷取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上的使用者存取資料，而且您想要每個擷取資料，由資料庫的安全性設定來加以驗證，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval of data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. 如果屬性設定為並已指定屬性、 篩選條件運算式會評估與任何提供屬性和結果篩選條件期間會套用到的資料清單作業。If the property is set to and a property has been specified, the filter expression is evaluated with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 方法會委派給方法相關聯的物件控制項。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要執行資料擷取作業，建置使用的物件文字和任何相關聯值，然後再執行對基礎資料庫。To perform a data retrieval operation, the builds a object by using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式呼叫方法，並設定查詢的結果為基礎的值。The following examples show how to programmatically call the method and set values based on the result of the query. 下列範例顯示 Web 控制項的宣告式程式碼。The following example shows the declarative code for the Web controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式呼叫方法。The following example shows how to programmatically call the method. 控制項傳回一個整數。The control returns an integer. 整數值用來設定的文字控制項，並判斷是否要顯示控制項。The value of the integer is used to set the text of a control and to determine whether to display a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 字串， 控制項會用來擷取基礎資料庫的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to retrieve data from the underlying database.

value.span: 用來擷取資料的 SQL 字串或預存程序名稱。

span.span: An SQL string or the name of a stored procedure that the uses to retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表 SQL 查詢還是預存程序中，名稱，而且由方法，以擷取 SQL Server 資料庫中的資料。The property represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method to retrieve data from a SQL Server database. 如果您在選取的命令中使用星號 （\*），以選取所有資料行，而且如果您使用自動產生程式碼來執行更新或刪除作業，請確定沒有資料行就會有其名稱中的空格。If you use an asterisk (\*) in the Select command to select all columns, and if you use automatic code generation to perform update or delete operations, make sure that no columns have spaces in their names. 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，該參數的替代符號是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或是，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 基於安全考量，屬性不會儲存檢視狀態。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因為它可能會有要解碼的用戶端上的檢視狀態內容，在檢視中儲存機密資訊的資料庫結構狀態可能會導致資訊洩漏弱點。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定基本的 SQL 查詢，以從 ODBC 相容資料庫中擷取資料，並顯示在文字控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何設定預存程序名稱的文字和屬性設值，以從 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫擷取資料，並顯示在控制項。The second code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 在這兩個範例中，沒有不需要明確呼叫方法因為附加至資料來源的資料繫結控制項控制透過屬性會自動呼叫期間方法階段。In both examples, there is no need to explicitly call the method because the data-bound controls that are attached to the data source control through the property will automatically call the method during the phase. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定基本的 SQL 查詢，以從 ODBC 相容資料庫中擷取資料，並顯示在文字控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc/CS/odbc4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc/VB/odbc4vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定預存程序名稱的文字和屬性設值，以擷取 SQL Server 資料庫中的資料，並顯示在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 屬性可以是 SQL 查詢或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/CS/sql14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/VB/sql14vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得參數集合，包含與 控制項相關聯之 物件 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，包含 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢集合包含任何對應至 SQL 字串中參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者，這是參數的順序集合可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者建立關聯的參數出現在參數化 SQL 查詢的順序根據集合中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，也就是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，將集合中的參數，藉由比對的 SQL 查詢中的預留位置別名的參數名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性會擷取屬性所含相關聯的物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，藉由設定SQL 查詢的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server by setting the property to an SQL query. 在參數化 SQL 查詢和在預留位置屬性會對應到物件加入至集合。The SQL query is parameterized and the placeholder in the property is matched to the object that is added to the collection. 控制哪些繫結至、 做為篩選條件的項目會顯示在控制項。The control, which the is bound to, acts as a filter for what is displayed in the control. 如需其他類型，您可以使用的參數資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For information about other types of parameters you can use, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 因為參數用在 WHERE 子句中，使用程式碼範例中的屬性相當於使用和屬性。Because the parameter is used in a WHERE clause, the use of the property in the code example is functionally equivalent to using the and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 評估屬性只有當 SQL 命令也就是包含屬性是預存程序的名稱。The property is evaluated only when the SQL command that is contained by the property is the name of a stored procedure. 在此情況下，如果屬性設定，其中包含用來排序結果的預存程序參數的名稱。In this case, if the property is set, it contains the name of a parameter that is used to sort the results of the stored procedure. 如果屬性設定，它會附加至屬性。If the property is set, it is prepended to the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定以分號分隔的字串，表示用於 Microsoft SQL Server 快取相依性的資料庫和資料表。

span.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

value.span: 字串，表示用於 SQL Server 快取相依性的資料庫和資料表。

span.span: A string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the SQL Server cache dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援根據選擇性的到期原則（服務必須設定為資料庫伺服器） 的資料快取的物件。The control supports an optional expiration policy based on the object for the data cache (the service must be configured for the database server). 字串會識別資料庫和資料表根據相同的格式，可由`@ Page`指示詞，其中字串的第一個部分是 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串，後面接著冒號分隔符號和最後資料庫資料表的名稱 (例如`"connectionstring1:table1"`)。The string identifies databases and tables according to the same format that is used by the `@ Page` directive, where the first part of the string is a connection string to a Microsoft SQL Server database, followed by a colon delimiter, and finally the name of the database table (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1"`). 如果取決於多個資料表的屬性、 連接字串和表格名稱組會以分號 (比方說， `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`)。If the property depends on more than one table, the connection string-and-table name pairs are separated by semicolons (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`). > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用在 Microsoft Windows 驗證的用戶端模擬時，第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一位使用者要求相同的資料，就會從快取擷取資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料，不會擷取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上的使用者存取資料，而且您想要每個擷取資料的安全性組態資料庫所要驗證，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 SQL Server 快取相依性，並設定屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a control. 在此範例中，資料庫是每隔 120 秒輪詢。In this example, the database is polled every 120 seconds. Northwind Traders 員工中的資料期間，資料表的變更時間，快取的任何資料控制項，並顯示控制重新整理控制下一步 就會輪詢資料庫的時間。If the data in the Northwind Traders Employees table changes during that time, any data that is cached by the control and displayed by the control is refreshed by the control the next time the database is polled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql/CS/sql23cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql/VB/sql23vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會自動呼叫， ，和控制在回傳期間，如果資料已經變更。The method is automatically called by the , , and controls during postback if the data has been changed. 在其他控制項中，已變更的資料在回傳期間可以明確地呼叫方法事件。For data that has been changed in other controls, the method can be explicitly called on postback during the event. 再執行作業時，方法呼叫來引發事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理之前作業。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 在後作業完成時，方法呼叫來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法會委派給方法相關聯的物件控制項。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要執行更新作業，組建物件使用文字以及任何相關聯屬性，然後執行對基礎資料庫的物件。To perform an update operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示中的資料控制和更新資料時**送出**按一下按鈕時。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何顯示從 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫中擷取的資料控制項，並更新記錄使用控制項。The second code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示中的資料控制和更新資料時**送出**按一下按鈕時。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 屬性設定與參數化的 SQL 陳述式，以及兩個參數新增至集合。The property is set with a parameterized SQL statement, and two parameters are added to the collection. 當**提交**按一下按鈕時，處理事件，以呼叫方法明確。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示資料從 SQL Server 資料庫中擷取控制項，並更新記錄使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 此範例示範如何使用物件時使用，將交易內容控制項更新資料。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 SQL 查詢或預存程序中，名稱，並由方法。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，該參數的替代符號是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或是，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 基於安全考量，屬性不會儲存檢視狀態。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因為它可能會有要解碼的用戶端上的檢視狀態內容，在檢視中儲存機密資訊的資料庫結構狀態可能會導致資訊洩漏弱點。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定的屬性Microsoft SQL Server database 中的控制和更新資料控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a Microsoft SQL Server database using the control. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何更新中的資料 ODBC 資料庫控制項。The second code example demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定的屬性控制和更新的資料，在 SQL Server 資料庫中使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a SQL Server database using the control. 會自動填入集合中，推斷的參數物件，並呼叫方法時**Update**連結可以讓您編輯已選取。The automatically populates the collection, inferring the parameters from the objects, and calls the method when the **Update** link on the editable is selected. 這個範例也包含一些後置處理： 記錄更新之後，傳送通知電子郵件訊息。This example also includes some post-processing: after a record is updated, a notification email message is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/CS/sql7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/VB/sql7vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例中，也就是功能上與先前的程式碼範例，示範如何更新中的資料 ODBC 資料庫控制項。The following code example, which is functionally identical to the preceding code example, demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 設定為 ODBC 的 ADO.NET 提供者，和屬性設定為 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN) 的名稱。The is set to the ADO.NET provider for ODBC, the , and the property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，以檢查的值更新作業完成後，輸出參數。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an update operation has completed. 輸出參數都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示及更新資料從 ODBC 資料庫中擷取控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to display and update data that is retrieved from an ODBC database in a control. 已成功更新記錄之後，事件由事件處理常式執行後置處理步驟傳送電子郵件通知的位置。After a record is successfully updated, the event is handled by an event handler to perform a post-processing step where an email notification is sent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢集合包含任何對應至 SQL 字串中參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 參數名稱可能會受到屬性，特別是如果名稱會識別主索引鍵，例如使用指定的索引鍵時，才`DataKeyNames`屬性的資料繫結控制項，或刪除和更新案例其中屬性設定為值和一組`oldValues`會傳遞至對應的資料方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property, specifically if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key specified using the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在此情況下，格式字串套用至每個參數名稱，在`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 參數的順序集合可能是重要的是，根據的 ADO.NET 提供者。The order of the parameters in the collection might be important, depending on the ADO.NET provider. 和提供者建立關聯的參數出現在參數化 SQL 查詢的順序根據集合中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，也就是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，將集合中的參數，藉由比對的 SQL 查詢中的預留位置別名的參數名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性會擷取屬性所含相關聯的物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示中的資料控制和更新資料時**送出**按一下按鈕時。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 設定與參數化的 SQL 陳述式和兩個參數新增至集合。The is set with a parameterized SQL statement and two parameters are added to the collection. 當**提交**按一下按鈕時，處理事件，以呼叫方法明確。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含可接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅，文字方塊中，值插入參數，而不需驗證，這也是潛在的安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前的額外的初始化作業控制項執行更新作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時不會呼叫事件處理常式委派。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您無法直接取消藉由呼叫資料庫作業方法所公開的物件物件。Therefore, you cannot directly cancel the database operation by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 您可以不過，將在資料庫作業取消藉由設定的屬性至`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數，而不需驗證，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前，先驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示從 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫中擷取的資料控制項，並更新記錄使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 此範例示範如何使用物件時使用，將交易內容控制項更新資料。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data.
